item.title: 1.21.108-rc
item.description:
## Note As of this version Irony supports analyze mode for HOI4. If you see any bugs in how Irony detects any definitions there please report on the issue tracker.
## Current Release Notes * Speed up resetting multiple resolutions * Some fixes * Optimize resolution UI when using large collections with lots of conflicts
## Release Notes 1.21 * Update dependencies * Minor fixes * Add conflict solver analyze mode only * Add option to export hash analysis report to clipboard * HOI4 conflict solver analyze support added (hopefully with no parser mapping errors) * Conflict solver reset conflicts notifications, indicators and filter * Enhance dds image handling * Optimize binary image preview

item.title: 1.21.108-rc
item.description:
## Note As of this version Irony supports analyze mode for HOI4. If you see any bugs in how Irony detects any definitions there please report on the issue tracker.
## Current Release Notes * Speed up resetting multiple resolutions * Some fixes * Optimize resolution UI when using large collections with lots of conflicts
## Release Notes 1.21 * Update dependencies * Minor fixes * Add conflict solver analyze mode only * Add option to export hash analysis report to clipboard * HOI4 conflict solver analyze support added (hopefully with no parser mapping errors) * Conflict solver reset conflicts notifications, indicators and filter * Enhance dds image handling * Optimize binary image preview

## Current Release Notes * Irony can now handle empty mod files (to prevent CTDs) * Reverse compatibility fix with older pdx launcher
## Changes From v1.19 * Update dependencies * Upgrade to net6.0 * Make Irony compliant with new Paradox Launcher 2021.10 formats

## Current Release Notes * Irony can now handle empty mod files (to prevent CTDs) * Reverse compatibility fix with older pdx launcher
